ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Automate package and project setup tasks that are otherwise performed manually. This includes setting up unit testing, test  coverage, continuous integration, Git, 'GitHub', licenses, 'Rcpp', 'RStudio'  projects, and more.

Automate package and project setup tasks that are otherwise performed manually. This includes setting up unit testing, test  coverage, continuous integration, Git, 'GitHub', licenses, 'Rcpp', 'RStudio'  projects, and more.

name: r-usethis
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.2.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-usethis
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/usethis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/usethis/usethis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 45bc39d35b0cc2ef7dfe03c488a05c0bac62b498a3d16f745b757e4fba772b77

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-clipr >=0.3.0
    - r-crayon
    - r-curl >=2.7
    - r-desc
    - r-ellipsis
    - r-fs >=1.3.0
    - r-gert >=1.0.2
    - r-gh >=1.2.0
    - r-glue >=1.3.0
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-purrr
    - r-rappdirs
    - r-rlang >=0.4.3
    - r-rprojroot >=1.2
    - r-rstudioapi
    - r-whisker
    - r-withr >=2.3.0
    - r-yaml
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-clipr >=0.3.0
    - r-crayon
    - r-curl >=2.7
    - r-desc
    - r-ellipsis
    - r-fs >=1.3.0
    - r-gert >=1.0.2
    - r-gh >=1.2.0
    - r-glue >=1.3.0
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-purrr
    - r-rappdirs
    - r-rlang >=0.4.3
    - r-rprojroot >=1.2
    - r-rstudioapi
    - r-whisker
    - r-withr >=2.3.0
    - r-yaml

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('usethis')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('usethis')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://usethis.r-lib.org, https://github.com/r-lib/usethis
  license: MIT
  summary: Automate package and project setup tasks that are otherwise performed manually. This includes setting up unit testing, test  coverage, continuous integration, Git, 'GitHub', licenses, 'Rcpp', 'RStudio'  projects, and more.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: usethis
# Title: Automate Package and Project Setup
# Version: 1.5.1
# Authors@R: c( person("Hadley", "Wickham", , "hadley@rstudio.com", role = "aut", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0003-4757-117X") ), person("Jennifer", "Bryan", , "jenny@rstudio.com", c("aut", "cre"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-6983-2759") ), person("RStudio", role = c("cph", "fnd")) )
# Description: Automate package and project setup tasks that are otherwise performed manually. This includes setting up unit testing, test  coverage, continuous integration, Git, 'GitHub', licenses, 'Rcpp', 'RStudio'  projects, and more.
# License: GPL-3
# URL: https://usethis.r-lib.org, https://github.com/r-lib/usethis
# BugReports: https://github.com/r-lib/usethis/issues
# Depends: R (>= 3.2)
# Imports: clipr (>= 0.3.0), clisymbols, crayon, curl (>= 2.7), desc, fs (>= 1.3.0), gh, git2r (>= 0.23), glue (>= 1.3.0), purrr, rlang, rprojroot (>= 1.2), rstudioapi, stats, utils, whisker, withr, yaml
# Suggests: covr, knitr, magick, pkgdown (>= 1.1.0), rmarkdown, roxygen2, spelling (>= 1.2), styler (>= 1.0.2), testthat (>= 2.1.0)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Language: en-US
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-07-04 07:03:22 UTC; jenny
# Author: Hadley Wickham [aut] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4757-117X>), Jennifer Bryan [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-6983-2759>), RStudio [cph, fnd]
# Maintainer: Jennifer Bryan <jenny@rstudio.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-07-04 11:00:05 UTC
